org.openimaj.image.processor

Interface SinglebandImageProcessor<T,S extends Image<T,S>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of pixel in the image that this processor can process.
    S - The concrete subclass of the single band image that this processor can process.
    All Superinterfaces:
    ImageProcessor<S>, Processor<S>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLocalThreshold, AdaptiveLocalThresholdBernsen, AdaptiveLocalThresholdContrast, AdaptiveLocalThresholdGaussian, AdaptiveLocalThresholdMean, AdaptiveLocalThresholdMedian, AnisotropicDiffusion, AverageBoxFilter, BicubicInterpolation, BilinearInterpolation, CannyEdgeDetector, CannyEdgeDetector2, CompassOperators.Compass0, CompassOperators.Compass135, CompassOperators.Compass45, CompassOperators.Compass90, DioramaEffect, Disk, EqualisationProcessor, FConvolution, FDiscGausConvolve, FFastGaussianConvolve, FGaussianConvolve, FImageConvolveSeparable, FixedResizeProcessor, FourierConvolve, FourierCorrelation, FSobelX, FSobelY, Gaussian2D, Laplacian3x3, LaplacianOfGaussian2D, LocalContrastFilter, MaxFilter, MedianFilter, MinFilter, PolygonExtractionProcessor, RemapProcessor, ResizeProcessor, StrokeWidthTransform, SumBoxFilter, SUSANEdgeDetector

    public interface SinglebandImageProcessor<T,S extends Image<T,S>>
extends ImageProcessor<S>
    An interface for objects that are able to process only SingleBandImages.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  SinglebandImageProcessor.Processable<T,S extends Image<T,S>,I extends Image<?,I>>
      An interface for Images that are processable by SinglebandImageProcessors.
